Please notify the staff of your affiliation as you rent equipment for bowling or billiards.      Rates      ** Reservations are now being accepted. **      Bowling - per person  Price      UIC Students *  $4.00    UIC Staff/Faculty and Alumni *  $4.50    Guests and General Public  $5.00    Shoe Rental  $3.00         Rates-Billiards       Billiards - per hour  Price      UIC Students *  $6.50    UIC Staff/Faculty and Alumni *  $8.00    Guests and General Public  $10.00          Reservations   Reservations are made in person on a first come, first serve basis and must be paid in full when reservation is made.Please call the front desk for information and availability at 312-413-5170.  Party Packages Party Packages are available for groups of 12 bowlers or more. We offer the special rate of $12 per person. Each person paid for will receive two hours of unlimited bowling and shoe rental.  Lane Reservation  Lane Reservations are available but must be made for a minimum of 2 lanes for an hour or 1 lane for two hours.Â The cost is $40 per lane per hour for guest reservations. It is recommended to have no more than 5 bowlers per lane to maximize the value of the package.          Bowling & Billiards           Hours    Rates and Reservations    Specials
